tool.name: Split col 25 BLAST results
tool.description: to create a unique entry per subject title
tool.help:
Some BLAST hits are grouped on identical proteins so that the 25th column looks like:
terminal repeat-encoded protein [Staphylococcus phage phiSA012]<>terminal repeat-encoded protein [Staphylococcus phage phiSA012]
This tool creates separate entries for each of the listed organisms in this column.
